text: <@U02F8TTPU> and <@U026PHQ3J>  just a head's up that our last build sent over on friday is going through a full QA pass today
I'll triage and assign JIRA bugs if/as they come in
sounds great, i'll look for those and start addressing as they come in... I see there is a new question about the results card, so I'll comment on that

FYI, I just updated my crashlytics instance and it broke Android studio integration, I cannot load any projects anymore. I did build the latest Broadway APK before doing this unfortunate plugin update, so I can distribute it, but it's going to take some debugging tomorrow to figure out why I cannot do any further builds at the moment.
That stinks! Sorry to hear it Marissa. Not worried from a project perspective though.
Glad to hear the latest build happened before the update :wink:
It's probably just a stinky plugin.. hopefully I correctly backed out all my changes and the APK has everything I planned to include.
this is when a fingers crossed emoji would come in handy
i think i added that to our custom emojis last time i had the same thought
OK, distrubted 1.22 on fabric. release notes:

Presort zip download list so most recently updated (featured) experience is queued for download first
Display experience intro fragments in a viewpager so left/right swipe pages through the current experiences
Dimension and layout adjustments so that screens > 600px use tablet dimensions
new logic to prevent an experience from starting (from gallery or featured experience) if network is disconnected
Adjusted bottom/left map image padding for better visibility of google logo
